headline: A Death-Haunted Poet, but on YouTube
abstract: The writer, whose performances have garnered hundreds of thousands of views online, explores her obsession with true crime and fear of male violence in her work.
lead_paragraph: If Olivia Gatwood had never found poetry, she would probably be dead by now. She said this nonchalantly backstage before a performance at Brooklynâ€™s Music Hall of Williamsburg for several hundred fans.
